title: “Bottom-up” and “top-down” strategies toward strong cellulose-based materials
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00387J, Review Article
Qin Qin, Shiyi Zeng, Gaigai Duan, Yanbo Liu, Xiaoshuai Han, Ruizhi Yu, Yong Huang, Chunmei Zhang, Jingquan Han, Shaohua Jiang
The research progress of strong cellulose-based materials from the “bottom-up” and “top-down” approaches are summarized.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
